title: The One That Could Have Been (Part 1)

Hey, you guys, guess what? Barry and Mindy are getting a divorce.

 Barry and Mindy.

 Who's Barry and Mindy? Barry was the guy I almost married, and Mindy was my best friend.
 Wasn't he cheating on you with her? That means he was falling asleep on her instead of me.
 Can you imagine if I'd married him? How different would my life be? I've always wondered how different life would be.

if I'd never gotten divorced.

and I lost $1 3,000,000.

you have got to listen.

maybe we can spice things up a little.
